articles.title: Kim Jong Il Watches Football Match
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Watches Football Match

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with servicepersons of the KPA watched a football match between Mangyongbong and Jebi teams of the KPA held in connection with the close of the 11th People's Sports Contest.
						 The Mangyongbong Team defeated the Jebi team 3:1 by successfully applying the Korean-style sporting method.
						
						 After watching the match, Kim Jong Il congratulated the footballers on their success in the match, expressing great satisfaction over a high level of the game played by them. 
						
						 He said that the servicepersons of the KPA, standard-bearers and members of shock brigade in implementing the Songun politics, are a model in sporting activities, too, highly praising the KPA for satisfactorily performing its honorable mission as a pioneer and pace-setter in the era of Songun.
						
						 He noted that to develop sports is of very weighty importance not only in successfully pushing forward the revolutionary struggle and construction to augment the might of the country but in boosting the friendly relations with various countries of the world.
						
						All the people are fully ready both for labor and national defence thanks to the successful realization of the work to popularize sports and make them part of their daily life in the DPRK and its sportspersons have registered good results in the international arena, fully demonstrating the honor of Juche Korea and the spirit of its people, he said, adding that this shining success is a striking demonstration of the validity and great vitality of the WPK's policy of sports.
						
						He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for rapidly developing the nation's sports, underscoring the need to put the sports technique on a higher level by rounding off the Korean-style sports technique, tactical system and method of training.
						
						 He was accompanied by commanding officers of the KPA including KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su and Kim Myong Guk, Department Director of the WPK Central Committee Jang Song Thaek and leading officials of the WPK Central Committee including its First Vice Department Directors Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Kil Su Am
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Kil Su Am

					
						Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of the late Kil Su Am, former writer of the April 15 Writing Group, on Oct. 31, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Greetings to Dominican President
articles.content:
Greetings to Dominican President

					
						Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Oct. 27 sent a message of greetings to Nicholas Liverpool, President of the Commonwealth of Dominica, on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the independence of the country. 
						Extending greetings to the Dominican government and people Kim, availing himself of the opportunity, expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' Anti-DPRK War Exercises Assailed
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' Anti-DPRK War Exercises Assailed

					
						Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland issued information bulletin No. 943 on Oct. 31 assailing the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers for staging Hoguk exercises, large-scale exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK, in south Korea.
						 The U.S. and the south Korean warhawks staged landing operations whenever they conducted anti-north war exercises under various codenames but it is the first time that they have staged large-scale combined landing operation by mobilizing division-level armed forces, the information bulletin noted, and continued:
						
						 The provocative large-scale war exercises staged again by the U.S. and the south Korean puppets against the north despite protest and denunciation by the public at home and abroad are an open military threat to the DPRK and an intolerable criminal act of pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a military conflict and the brink of a nuclear war.
						
						 Due to the warmongers' reckless confrontation and war moves the north-south relations that have favorably developed after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration are now in such a serious crisis after going beyond the phase of tension and confrontation that a military conflict and an all-out war may break out any moment.
						
						 The DPRK stands for peace and reunification of the country but it will never beg for them, allowing its dignity and sovereignty, its life and soul, to be encroached upon.
						
						Now that the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group keep pursuing a foolish aim to stand in confrontation with the DPRK with "strength" to the end, the DPRK will take resolute countermeasures to mercilessly punish provocateurs.
						
						 Those who pursue confrontation and war are bound to meet a shameful defeat and death.
						
						 The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group had better immediately stop their rash acts and the reckless DPRK-targeted saber rattling, cogitating about the serious consequences to be entailed by their moves for confrontation and war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Progressive Movement Organizations Denounced
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Progressive Movement Organizations Denounced

					
						Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council released a statement on Nov. 1 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for kicking up a whirlwind of suppression to stamp out the progressive movement organizations in south Korea while crying out for "eliminating pro-north leftist forces".
						 Accusing the group of traitors of perpetrating such fascist suppression as searching offices of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in various parts of south Korea, the June 15 Publishing House and the June 15 TV, etc., confiscating documents and arresting leading members of the solidarity one after another including its executive chairman on charges of violation of the ill-famed "National Security Law", the statement continued:
						
						 The organizations that have become targets of suppression in south Korea are righteous patriotic organizations that have taken the lead in the struggle to defend the nation's dignity, sovereignty and the right to existence, opposed to outsiders, and exerted all their efforts to support and implement the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
						
						However, the above-said group is brutally suppressing these organizations after labeling them "enemy-benefiting organizations" while regarding them as thorns in its flesh. This glaringly reveals its despicable anti-reunification and fascist true colors.
						
						 The acts of benefiting the enemy to be punished by the nation in the true sense of the words are the ones of frantically inciting confrontation between fellow countrymen while negating the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration after selling off the interests and the sovereignty of the nation to outsiders.  The Lee group of traitors is the arch criminals. 
						
						The reality clearly proves that it is impossible to expect the democratization of the south Korean society and the guarantee of the right to existence nor is it possible to improve the inter-Korean relations and national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, as long as the present conservative ruling forces are allowed to stay in power. 
						
						The Lee group should face up to the irresistible trend of the times and the mindset of the people towards independence, democracy, reunification and prosperity and immediately stop the suppression of the progressive pro-reunification patriotic organizations and the confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Meeting of Youth League Officials of Elder Generations and Younger Generation Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Youth League Officials of Elder Generations and Younger Generation Held

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting of exemplary youth league officials of the elder generations and the participants in the national conference of active members of primary organizations of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was held at the Central Youth Hall on Oct. 31.
						 At the meeting, youth league officials of the elder generations recalled that officials of the Democratic Youth League energetically conducted political work on the frontline during the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, encouraging the soldiers to wipe out the enemy and making breakthrough toward the advances of units making charges.
						
						 They recollected the days when the youth league officials united the young people close around the Party and led them to take the lead in implementing the Party's policies, cherishing the loyalty to the leader as their life and soul in the periods of the great Chollima surge and socialist construction. 
						
						 Youth league officials of the younger generation evinced their resolutions at the meeting. 
						
						 They vowed to learn from the revolutionary spirit and work style displayed by the youth league officials of the elder generations and consolidate the organizations of the league as entities devotedly defending the leader, the ranks of human bullets and bombs and thus fully prepare all the young people as reliable successors to the Songun revolutionary cause.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Beats Costa Rican Team
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Beats Costa Rican Team

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A match between the DPRK team and the Costa Rican team belonging to Group B of group league matches of the FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup New Zealand 2008 was held on Nov. 1.
						 The DPRK team defeated the Costa Rican team 2-1 at the match.

articles.title: DPRK Team Beats Lebanese Team
articles.content:
DPRK Team Beats Lebanese Team 

					
						 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A match between the DPRK team and the Lebanese team belonging to Group C of group league matches of the 2008 Under-19 Asian Football Confederation Championships was held in Saudi Arabia on Saturday.
						 The DPRK team defeated the Lebanese team 4:0.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Outbursts Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Outbursts Slammed

					
						 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Sometime ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak blustered at the "social gathering of ministers related to diplomacy and security" that he would not be pulled about by the north without principle but hold fast to the basic principles of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars." Minister of "Unification" Kim Ha Jung let loose a spate of balderdash that he would maintain the principles even though "the north decries" the south. 
						 The so-called "principles" uttered by the puppet traitors who stake their fates on national division and confrontation are nothing but sheer sophism aimed to justify their treacherous acts, says a signed commentary of Rodong Sinmun today. 
						
						 The Lee Myung Bak regime is still going rampant, not understanding the gravity of the situation, the commentary notes, and goes on:
						
						 In a nutshell, the Lee group's said outcries are nothing but provocative remarks intended to negate the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and realize the treacherous "policy toward the north" at any cost in a bid to bedevil the inter-Korean relations and furthermore, ignite a war of aggression against the north. 
						
						 It is ridiculous enough for the south Korean puppets to try to defend their watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" with such pretexts as "co-existence and co-prosperity" and peddling them while asserting that they are "basic principles."
						
						 It is as clear as noonday that the Lee group have no will to achieve reconciliation and cooperation with the north and national reunification as they insist on the principles no worthy of principles while terming the DPRK's repeated warnings "denunciation." The "theory of adherence to the principles" raised by the traitorous group to cope with the DPRK's just countermeasure proves that they have no intention to negotiate and cooperate with the DPRK but seek to keep to the road of confrontation and a war with it. 
						
						 The Lee group are bound to pay dear prices for the crimes committed by them as they go reckless for confrontation with the DPRK bereft of a reason being keen on treachery.

articles.title: Anniversary of Famous Work of Kim Jong Il Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Famous Work of Kim Jong Il Observed

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il in his famous work "Socialism Is a Science" published on Nov. 1, Juche 83 (1994) clarified the fact that socialism is an idea and a revolutionary banner for the popular masses struggling for independence and the advantages, and the invincibility of the popular masses-centered Korean-style socialism, an embodiment of the Juche idea.
						 Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates a signed article to this day.
						
						 It says:
						
						Over the past more than a decade since the publication of the work Korean-style socialism has been firmly preserved and its invincible might fully demonstrated under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
						
						 The wise leadership provided by him to lead the Juche-oriented  cause of socialism to victory lies in that he made sure that a collectivist principle and revolutionary principles were firmly adhered to in all fabrics of social life and exerted utmost effort for strengthening the driving force for the revolution as required by the Songun era.
						
						 His wise leadership also lies in that he has pursued politics of noble love and trust, thus helping all people cherish the idea that the system in the DPRK is the best as unshakable faith.
						
						Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the whole society is pervaded with the Juche idea and the Songun idea and the People's Army, the mainstay of the Korean revolution, has grown to be an invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu. It is Songun Korea today which counters the imperialists' hard-line policy with the toughest measures and their carrot strategy with a revolutionary principle and is fully demonstrating its sovereign dignity.
						
						 Socialism of Juche is sure to triumph as long as there are the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il and the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people firmly united around the headquarters of the revolution in thinking and faith, concludes the article.

articles.title: Anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's Work Observed

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- "On Some Problems Arising in the Creation of Revolutionary Films", a speech made by President Kim Il Sung before film workers on Nov. 1, Juche 57 (1968) serves as important guidelines that hold an important position in view of its historic significance and the development of film art at present, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
						 The work clarifies the character and mission of the Juche-based film art, a powerful weapon for thoroughly implementing the Party's policy on revolutionizing and working-classizing all members of the society, the orientation of its future development and concrete ways to do so.
						
						 Recalling that that day leader Kim Jong Il gave a talk "On Truly Depicting Life in the Creation of Revolutionary Films" to officials in the field of film art to embody the profound idea and policy clarified by the President in the work, the article goes on:
						
						 General Secretary Kim Jong Il who nurtured the lofty aim to effect a revolution in the field of film art since the first days of his leadership over the revolution and construction made a breakthrough toward attaining it by realizing the noble intention of the President.
						
						Kim Jong Il made sure that the work of establishing a revolutionary tradition in the field of film art was oriented to a drive to firmly defend and glorify the immortal revolutionary feats of the President.
						
						Kim Jong Il took the initiative in adapting immortal classic masterpieces to movies and led the creators to regard it as an immovable principle to fully represent the ideological contents of the original works, thus making it possible for the works to shed their rays all over the world as textbooks for the popular masses in their struggle and life for independence.
						
						He became member of the creating group and created works which can serve as models of revolutionary masterpieces of Korean style. He also led the film workers to create a lot of masterpieces conducive to promoting the drive to revolutionize and working-classize all members of the society.
						
						The precious achievements made in the course of effecting a revolution in film art that ushered in a new era of Juche-oriented renaissance in the 20th century are the shining fruition of the tireless efforts made by the leader to thoroughly carry out the idea and intention of the President.
						
						Times advanced and old generations are replaced by new ones but the precious tradition established in the course of effecting a revolution in the field of film art continues to serve as an engine steadily promoting the development of the film art in the DPRK.

articles.title: Hoguk Joint Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
Hoguk Joint Exercises under Fire

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The madcap Hoguk joint military exercises for aggression that started on Oct. 30 by an emergency order are going on in the land, seas and sky of south Korea, according to a military source.
						The 2nd and 7th army corps and the "Metropolitan Garrison Command" of the puppet army deployed in the area south of the River Han formed an operational unit before occupying positions for commencing attack while marines of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the marine corps of the puppet armed forces launched the largest-ever combined landing operational exercise with the area of Phohang as an operational theatre.
						
						Flying corps of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces that flew into their air force bases in south Korea from overseas bases and the U.S. 7th Air Force and flying corps of the puppet air force are busy flying in the air above Phyongchang, Thaebaek, Ryechon, Kumi, Kongju and Anmyon Island within the framework of the Hoguk joint military exercises to conduct drills for striking targets and providing close air support.
						
						 These joint military exercises are provocative saber-rattling aimed at mounting a preemptive surprise attack on the DPRK and exercises for a war of aggression from A to Z in view of their nature, program and scale.
						
						 These exercises launched with an aim to officially upgrade the "CONPLAN 5029" into "OPLAN 5029" is intended to examine the feasibility of the operational plans designed to mount "a preemptive surprise attack" on the DPRK and boost the capability for carrying out a real war in "contingency".
						
						 The adventurous Hoguk war exercises are rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula so tense that a war may break out any moment.

articles.title: Case against Hanchongryon Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
Case against Hanchongryon Censured in S. Korea

					
						 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- The Struggle Headquarters of the 16th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) made public an emergency statement on Oct. 29 in protest against the moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to fake up a case against the progressive camp including Hanchongryon under the pretext of "security."
						 The statement accused the security authorities of searching and confiscating e-mail of former officials of Hanchongryon and conducting call and investigation into them on absurd charges that Hanchongryon spearheaded the struggle to remove the statue of MacArthur and the protest against the U.S. president's trip to south Korea in 2005 at the "instruction of the north."
						
						This action proved itself that the security authorities are going to employ such trite method as faking up "spying case" again, it said.
						
						 It charged that their mean behavior of hatching a plot is groundless deception aimed to term the past struggle a "riot staged by leftist pro-communist forces" by linking it with the north. 
						
						The Lee group is keen on "witch-hunting"-style suppression of Hanchongryon by invoking the "National Security Law" just as the past dictatorial regimes did going against the June 15 era of reunification, it noted, demanding the Lee "government" stop sheer fabrication of case, search and suppression of Hanchongryon and progressive camp and make apology before the times and people.

articles.title: Negotiations for Increasing Funds for Upkeep of U.S. Forces Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Negotiations for Increasing Funds for Upkeep of U.S. Forces Protested in S. Korea

					
						 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Over 10 political parties and civic and social organizations of south Korea including the Democratic Labor Party, the Solidarity for Progress and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification jointly called a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 29 in protest against the south Korea-U.S. negotiations for increasing the funds for the upkeep of the U.S. forces.
						At the conference speakers referred to the fact that negotiations took place between the south Korean authorities and the U.S. in Seoul on the same day for the conclusion of a special agreement on the share of the funds for the U.S. forces, denouncing the U.S. for scheming to burden south Korea again with the expenses for the transfer of the U.S. second division although it is obliged to cover them.
						
						 Urging the "government" to strongly reject the U.S. unreasonable demand and raise voices calling for the cut-down of the funds for the upkeep of the U.S. forces, they demanded the U.S. return the funds it has illegally accumulated and stop demanding increased upkeep.
						
						 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held a meeting in front of the puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade on the same day to demand the retraction of the special agreement on the share of the funds for the upkeep of the U.S. forces.

articles.title: Halt to War Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to War Exercises Demanded in S. Korea 

					
						 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity of Youth and Students for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea made public a statement titled "The Lee Myung Bak regime, stop at once Hoguk exercises for a war of aggression against the north" on October 30.
						 Recalling that some time ago the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea let loose the reckless remarks that it is necessary to let the north believe that south Korea has a division-level Marine Corps capable of conducting landing operations, and other outcries, the statement branded Hoguk exercises started in the wake of the reckless remarks as exercises aiming at a preemptive attack on the north.
						
						 The danger of the above-said exercises lies in that they are intended to launch aggression of the north by upgrading the "CONPLAN-5029" aiming at a preemptive attack into the "OPLAN-5029," the statement said.
						
						 It denounced the U.S. and the Lee regime for getting pronounced in their war exercises to stifle the other party by force of arms behind the curtain, while talking about "dialogue" and "peace."
						
						 The confrontational policy of the Lee regime has rendered the situation on the Korean Peninsula so tense that a war may break out there any moment, the statement added.

articles.title: Moves to Stamp Out Pro-Reunification Movement Organization Condemned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Moves to Stamp Out Pro-Reunification Movement Organization Condemned in S. Korea

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and other figures in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 27 to denounce the puppet authorities for their moves to stamp out an organization for the reunification movement.
						 Speakers at the conference accused the authorities of instigating construction businesses to remove the Institute for Reunification Studies from Jongro District in Seoul and dwelling houses of its residents under the pretext of "redevelopment."
						
						 They charged that the "Grand National Party" provided construction businesses with a legal lever to remove buildings in the above-said district while talking about the "law on city adjustment."
						
						 This action taken by the authorities is aimed at eliminating the organization for the reunification movement and depriving people of their cradle to bring profits to themselves and those businesses, they stressed.

articles.title: Drop of Puppet Authorities' Plan to Increase Military Spending Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Drop of Puppet Authorities' Plan to Increase Military Spending Demanded in S. Korea

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other civic and social organizations in south Korea held the 84th meeting for peace and disarmament in Seoul on Oct. 28 to demand the puppet authorities roll back their policy for increasing military spending.
						Speakers at the meeting referred to the fact that the "government" submitted to the "National Assembly" a "bill on defense budget for 2009" calling for 28,637.9 billion won or 7.5 percent bigger than this year's.
						
						  Noting that the snowballing military spending is further deepening the economic crisis, they urged the authorities to make an overall reexamination of the "bill."
						
						They demanded the authorities drastically cut down the funds for the transfer of the U.S. military bases, south Korea's share of the funds for the upkeep of the U.S. forces and others.
						
						A message of protest to the NA read out at the meeting termed the above-said acts actions of blocking peaceful reunification on the Korean Peninsula and gravely threatening the lives of the people undergoing serious economic difficulties. 
						
						Even the NA which should speak for the will of the people is taking the lead in supporting the authorities' moves to increase the military spending, it deplored. 
						
						It branded the action to increase the military spending for purchasing weapons for a preemptive attack on the north as a treacherous act of diametrically running counter to the trend of the times towards the building of a peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean Peninsula and demanded the authorities retract it at once.

articles.title: Plot against Hanchongryon Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Plot against Hanchongryon Disclosed in S. Korea

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Measure Committee for Frustrating the Crackdown upon Participants in Candlelight Actions, Moves for Scrapping the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration and the Plot to Fake up a Case for Suppressing the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea on Oct. 29 made public a statement titled "We denounce the plot to fake up a case for suppressing the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) under the pretext of security."
						 The statement accused the security authorities of conducting a search and confiscation operation and call and investigation into the former officials of Hanchongryon, on charges that the 13th-term Hanchongryon spearheaded the struggle to remove the statue of MacArthur and a protest against Bush's trip to south Korea in 2005 at the "instruction of the north."
						
						 The then struggle was a joint struggle waged by the entire progressive camp 60 years after the U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea, the statement said, terming the police's charge groundless.
						
						 Recalling that the struggle against the U.S. president's junket to south Korea was also participated in by members of different progressive organizations in the world, the statement said that if the authorities' assertion was considered to be true, this would imply that they also participated in the protest at the "instruction of the north."
						
						 The recent suppression was aimed at labeling Hanchongryon an organization active at the "instruction of the north" in a bid to justify their crackdown upon the candlelight struggles participated in by the organization by branding them as anti-"government" actions staged by pro-north leftist forces, it stressed.
						
						 It declared that the organization bitterly denounced the security authorities for their plot to expand the case and would conduct a powerful struggle against the Lee Myung Bak regime's bid to bring back the era of fascist dictatorship.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked

					
						 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar of organizations for the study of the Juche idea and a book and photo exhibition were held at Kyambogo University of Uganda and a film show at a company of Russia on Oct. 15 and 24 on the occasions of the 63rd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 82nd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
						 Displayed at the exhibition halls were famous works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos showing their immortal exploits and books and photos introducing successes gained by the Korean people in socialist construction under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
						
						 Speakers including Baguma Isoke, chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and Auma Okumu, head of the Juche Idea Study Group of the Department of Psychology of Kyambogo University of Uganda, paid respectful homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who successfully built the WPK into the model party of the world revolutionary parties.
						
						 They explained in depth about the foundation of the WPK guided by the immortal Juche idea, its historic significance and successes gained by the Korean people in the revolution and construction under the wise leadership of the WPK.
						
						 The president of a company of Russia, after watching a DPRK film, said that he became to know better about the Korean people's ardent reverence for Kim Jong Il who has further strengthened and developed the WPK into the invincible party, adding that he sincerely wishes Korean people greater successes in their efforts to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation under the leadership of the WPK led by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and October 4 Declaration Supported
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and October 4 Declaration Supported

					
						 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with Korean people was held in Poland on Oct. 11 on the occasions of the 28th anniversary of the advancement of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) and the 1st anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration at which figures of different social standings supported the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
						Speakers including the chairman of the Poland-DPRK Association highly praised the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung who clarified the most reasonable way of achieving national reunification by setting forth the proposal for founding the DFRK and noble patriotic politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who brought about a turning point in the movement for the development of the inter-Korean relations and national reunification by making sure that the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was published.
						
						 They said that the said declarations are the most fair and aboveboard great programmes for realizing independent and peaceful reunification of Korea in the idea of "By our nation itself," stressing that the attitude to these declarations is a touchstone distinguishing patriotism from treachery and reunification from division on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Studied and Disseminated in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Studied and Disseminated in Austria

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A briefing on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was held in Vienna City, Austria, on Oct. 16.
						Present there were Oliver Jonischkeit, secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, Heinrich Gruber, chairman of the Vienna, 21 District Committee of the Communist Party of Austria, and people.
						
						 The secretary explained the main contents of the work.
						
						 He said that he was pleased to receive the historic work authored by Kim Jong Il.
						
						Kim Jong Il has upheld the banner of socialism on the basis of the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung, eternal president of the DPRK, even under the complicated circumstances, he noted, adding:
						
						He has pursued the Songun politics, smashing the moves of the U.S. imperialists and other imperialists to stifle the DPRK and wisely leading the Korean people's struggle for strengthening and developing socialism and achieving the country's reunification.
						
						His work is of great significance not only for the organizations struggling for the interests of the working class but for the world progressives aspiring after socialism.

articles.title: Solidarity Expressed for Struggle of WPK and Korean People
articles.content:
Solidarity Expressed for Struggle of WPK and Korean People

					
						 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Events were held in Venezuela, Poland and Pakistan between Oct. 4 and 8 on the occasions of the 63rd founding anniversary of the WPK and the 82nd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union at which several figures expressed solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea and Korean people in their struggle.
						 Julio Rafael Chavez, mayor of Tores City in Venezuela, addressing a meeting, said that the Venezuelan revolutionaries express full solidarity with the WPK and heroic Korean people in their struggle to put an end to the U.S. troops' presence in south Korea and achieve the independent reunification of the country.
						
						 Andrzej Kozlowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, highly praised socialist Korea for having advanced steadfastly along the road chosen by itself under the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il without the slightest vacillation despite the desperate moves of the enemies to stifle it.
						
						 Akrak Aktar Hamidi, chairman of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, expressed confidence that the WPK under the leadership of Kim Jong Il would demonstrate its ever-victorious might in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia partido de futbol con uniformados del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia partido de futbol con uniformados del EPC

					
						Pyongyang, 1 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC el partido de futbol entre el equipo "Mangyongbong" y el "Jebi" del EPC entablado con motivo de la clausurada XI Competencia Deportiva del Pueblo.
						 El equipo "Mangyongbong" gano al "Jebi" por 3 a 1 empleando a diestras los metodos de juego al estilo coreano.
						
						Tras disfrutar el partido, el Comandante Supremo se mostro muy satisfecho de este excelente juego de alto nivel y felicito los exitos de los jugadores.
						
						Los uniformados del EPC, abanderados y brigada de choque en la ejecucion de la politica de Songun (priorizacion militar), son ejemplares tambien en las actividades deportivas, senalo y aprecio mucho los meritos del EPC que cumple satisfactoriamente su honrosa mision de explorador y guia de la epoca del Songun.
						
						 Prosiguio que el desarrollo deportivo resulta muy importante tanto en fortalecer el poderio del pais al impulsar exitosamente la lucha revolucionaria y la construccion como en robustecer las relaciones de amistad con varios paises del mundo.
						
						Como resultado de la exitosa conversion del deporte en una labor masiva y cotidiana en nuestro pais, todo el pueblo coreano esta preparado firmemente para el trabajo y la defensa nacional y los deportistas coreanos exaltan altamente el honor de la Corea del Juche y el impetu de su pueblo alcanzando magnificos exitos en las competencias internacionales, apunto y agrego que este orgulloso exito deviene una muestra patente de la justeza y gran vitalidad de la politica deportiva del PTC.
						
						 Destacando la necesidad de situar en una etapa mas alta el nivel tecnico deportivo al perfeccionar las tecnicas, sistemas tacticos y metodos de entrenamiento al estilo coreano, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para lograr un desarrollo trascendental en el deporte nacional.
						
						Le acompanaron en presenciar el encuentro futbolistico los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su y Kim Myong Guk y otros directivos del EPC, el jefe de departamento, Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il, y otros cuadros responsables del CC del PTC.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia "ejercicios Hoguk" para la guerra anti-RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia "ejercicios Hoguk" para la guerra anti-RPDC

					
						Pyongyang, 1 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el 31 de octubre la informacion no. 943 en relacion con que Estados Unidos y los belicistas surcoreanos iniciaron en el suelo surcoreano los "ejercicios Hoguk" de gran envergadura para la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea.
						 Aunque es de costumbre que ellos ejercitaran el desembarco cada vez que libraban los ejercicios belicos de toda indole contra la RPDC,  nunca habian participado como esta vez las fuerzas armadas a nivel de division en esa operacion conjunta, comienza la nota y prosigue:
						
						Al librar esos provocativos ejercicios belicos, que toman por su blanco a la RPDC, pese a las denuncias y rechazo dentro y fuera del pais, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos amenazan militar y publicamente a la RPDC y cometen un imperdonable acto criminal de llevar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al choque militar y a la coyuntura de guerra nuclear.
						
						Debido a esas temerarias maniobras de confrontacion y guerra de los belicistas, las relaciones Norte-Sur, que se desarrollaban favorablemente despues de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, sobrepasaron hoy las etapas de tension y confrontacion y llegan al estado tan critico que puede desatar el choque militar o la guerra total.
						
						La RPDC desea la paz y la reunificacion del pais, pero no va a mendigarlas nunca sacrificando hasta su dignidad y soberania, que le significan la vida.
						
						 Dado que EE.UU. y los compinches de Lee Myung Bak persiguen su estupida ilusion de enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC por via militar, esta tomara resueltas contramedidas y castigara implacablemente a los provocadores.
						
						 Lo que les tocara a quienes persiguen la confrontacion y guerra es la ignominiosa derrota y muerte.
						
						EE.UU. y la banda de Lee deben actuar con prudencia meditando la grave consecuencia que emanara de sus maniobras para la confrontacion y guerra contra la RPDC y poner fin ahora mismo a ese temerario ejercicio belico contra ella.

articles.title: CRN denuncia represion de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRN denuncia represion de banda de Lee Myung Bak

					
						Pyongyang, 1 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Consejo por la Reconciliacion Nacional (CRN) hizo publica este sabado una declaracion de denuncia a la banda de Lee Myung Bak que abogando por "eliminar a las fuerzas izquierdistas pro-Norte", libra una horrenda campana de represion contra las entidades del movimiento progresista del Sur de Corea. 
						 La banda del traidor Lee registro por la fuerza e incauto documentos en las oficinas de la Solidaridad de Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte del 15 de Junio (SE), la Editorial 15 de Junio y la TV 15 de Junio ubicadas en distintas localidades del Sur de Corea, recuerda la nota y continua:
						
						Ademas, cometio la accion fascista de detener y encarcelar uno tras otro al presidente ejecutivo y otros miembros medulares de la SE en virtud de la infame "ley de seguridad". 
						
						Las entidades, que son blancos de esa represion, se tratan de las patrioticas y justicieras que estuvieron al frente de la lucha contra las fuerzas extranjeras y por la defensa de la dignidad, la soberania y el derecho a la vida de la nacion y se esforzaron en todo lo posible por apoyar y ejecutar la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.  
						
						Sin embargo, al reprimir brutalmente esas entidades tildandolas de "pro-enemigas" y considerandolas como la espina atravesada en la garganta, esa horda de traidores mostro su asquerosa naturaleza fascista anti-reunificacion.
						
						 Hoy dia, la verdadera accion pro-enemiga para los coreanos la comete esa pandilla vendiendo a las fuerzas extranjeras los intereses y la soberania nacionales, negando la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y persiguiendo obstinadamente la confrontacion fratricida.
						
						 La realidad demuestra claramente que si se dejan intactas las actuales fuerzas conservadoras en el poder, no se puede garantizar la democratizacion ni el derecho a la vida en la sociedad surcoreana ni esperar la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas ni la reunificacion de la patria, que desea tanto la nacion coreana.
						
						La pandilla de Lee debe parar ahora mismo la represion contra las entidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion y las maniobras de confrontacion con la RPDC viendo correctamente la infrenable corriente de la epoca hacia la independencia, la democracia, la reunificacion y la prosperidad y justipreciando la voluntad del pueblo.
